fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 8.25 points or 0.04% to settle at 19,680.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slumped 12.10% to 10.24. HDFC Bank, Axis Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
